answers.answer: I had the same problem I had a seizure on easter the first time am p.g 16 weeks u have to be healthy.. and check for ur blood sugar like if u were a diabetic ....witch am not but my sugar was low and thats what caused me to have a seizure...
This has to do with high blood pressure and it just so happens that it runs in my family.

Well yea ur right but diabetics get the same thing cuz when I blacked out my husvand was their and said I had a seizure...dont recall it but now am forced to eat...but I heard u can still have a healthy p.g but I think they would give u meds or a steroids for that

I had that with my 1st and im going through the same thing. I was told by a specialist that if your bp get out of control thats when they have to deliver rather its early or FT. But they keep a close eye on you give u meds and if that do not help delivery is the last resort. And yes if theyll give you a shot to help the baby lungs develope

question: Im curious on if i have more of a chance to have this baby early even if i dont get preeclampsia again. This is my 2nd pregnancy. Is there that possibility for this one to be early as well.
title: 2nd pregnancy after first one having preeclampsia?
